The 31-year-old star- who posed for Playboy magazine last year- explained while she is proud her assets are her own, they do`` flop'' when she takes her underwear off. She said: Well, they're mine so that's nice. They're not fake, but they hang a bit.`` They're not super-perky because they're so big. That's always a big disappointment, I think. Like when you take your top off and they go flop! LONDON( Reuters)-`` The X Factor,'' which has a U.S. launch this year, won the talent show category at Britain's National Television Awards on Wednesday, beating Britain's Got Talent, `` Dancing on Ice'' and`` Strictly Come Dancing.'' His jumper was deadly.'' Using mostly jump Robert Horrys, Allen Iverson went 20-of-30 from the field. He also hit 10-of-13 free-throw attempts en route to his third career 50-point game and first since February 6 against Sacramento. When your jumper is on, the basket seems like an ocean and the Marcus Gilbert seems like a rock, he said.`` That is the way it felt tonight.`` My teammates are the ones that set the screens for me and got me the ball in spots where I need the ball.
